name: Museum of Recovery
description:
Museum of Recovery is a Virtual Exhibition of things I've learned on my journey with mental health recovery.

Instructions: WASD or Arrow Keys to move and Mouse to turn. You can interact with buttons with Left Mouse Click. Press ESC for options menu to set up your mouse sensitivity and smoothness.

Disclaimer: I am not a healthcare or mental health professional. Please do not take any of this as a medical advice. If you need help or advice with your situation, please contact a professional.

Known issues: Lighting is quite broken at some places. Not much I can do about it right now unfortunately.
